articles.author: George Petras, Janet Loehrke
articles.title: Sudan conflict: US prepares troops to evacuate as fighting intensifies - USA TODAY
articles.description: Thousands of Americans remain in Sudan as the nation's army and a rival paramilitary group battle each other across capital city.
articles.content: The U.S. is preparing troops to evacuate American Embassy personnel in Sudan as a power struggle between two top military factions has erupted into widespread fighting across Khartoum, the capital ci… [+535 chars]

articles.author: Mitchell McCluskey
articles.title: Belgium destroys shipment of American beer after taking issue with 'Champagne of Beer' slogan - CNN
articles.description: Belgium has destroyed a shipment of American beer after taking exception to its maker's slogan that it was "The Champagne of Beers."
articles.content:
Belgium has destroyed a shipment of American beer after taking exception to its makers slogan that it was The Champagne of Beers.
Belgian customs crushed the 2,352 cans of Miller High Life beer earl… [+1917 chars]

articles.author: Alexander Hall
articles.title: CNN anchor asks if US wants ‘4 more years’ of Biden when 74% of Americans say US headed in ‘wrong direction' - Fox News
articles.description: A CNN host expressed skepticism that Biden can viably run for reelection when so many American citizen are skeptical of America's future on its current course.
articles.content:
CNN anchor John King noted President Bidens key challenges, and asked whether the American public truly plans to reelect him in 2024.
